trans-unit.source: At your request, the magic ally from your Bound Magic Creature ability can use its action to cast a minor spell on you. Afterward, it must retreat to its bound object to rest for one hour. The effects it can produce include the following.
trans-unit.target: At your request, the magic ally from your Bound Magic Creature ability can use its action to cast a minor spell on you. Afterward, it must retreat to its bound object to rest for one hour. The effects it can produce include the following.

trans-unit.source: Golden Anger. A golden light touches your eyes. For the next several minutes, if you attack a target, you inflict 2 additional points of damage.
trans-unit.target: Golden Anger. A golden light touches your eyes. For the next several minutes, if you attack a target, you inflict 2 additional points of damage.

trans-unit.source: Golden Ward. You gain +1 to Armor for one hour from a translucent sheen of golden light.
trans-unit.target: Golden Ward. You gain +1 to Armor for one hour from a translucent sheen of golden light.

trans-unit.source: Light of Truth. Whenever you attempt to discern falsehood during the next hour, the task is eased by two steps.
trans-unit.target: Light of Truth. Whenever you attempt to discern falsehood during the next hour, the task is eased by two steps.

trans-unit.source: Touch of Grace. With the magic ally’s touch, you add 3 points to any stat Pool. If you are not damaged, you add the points to your chosen Pool’s maximum. They remain until you spend them, you lose them to damage, or an hour passes.
trans-unit.target: Touch of Grace. With the magic ally’s touch, you add 3 points to any stat Pool. If you are not damaged, you add the points to your chosen Pool’s maximum. They remain until you spend them, you lose them to damage, or an hour passes.
